io.smudgr.util.source

Class Video

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.util.source.Video
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source

    public class Video
extends java.lang.Object
implements Source
    The Video source loads a video file and returns the current frame of the video, in time with the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Video(java.lang.String filename)
      Create a new Video loaded from the given file
      Video(java.lang.String filename, int start)
      Create a new Video loaded from the given file, and start it at the given second.
